text: Hit Me Hard and Soft is the third studio album by American singer-songwriter Billie Eilish. It was released on May 17, 2024, through Darkroom and Interscope Records. It is her first full-length studio album release since 2021's Happier Than Ever. Eilish co-wrote Hit Me Hard and Soft with her brother and frequent collaborator Finneas O'Connell. He also produced the album. Stylistically, it has been labeled as an alt-pop and bedroom pop album. Hit Me Hard and Soft was very well received by critics when it was released. It charted first in many countries. The album debuted second on Billboard 200 and charted all 10 of its songs in the top 40 of the Billboard Hot 100. The album and its songs were nominated at the 67th Grammy Awards, which included Album of the Year, Song of the Year, and Record of the Year. To support the album, Eilish has embarked on her seventh concert tour, Hit Me Hard and Soft: The Tour. It began on September 29, 2024. ==References== ==Other Websites== https://vi-control.net/community/threads/billie-eilishs-new-album-title-hit- me-hard-and-soft-comes-from-a-logic-synth-or-preset-she-misheard-what-is- it.151972/ https://www.forbes.com/sites/hughmcintyre/2025/01/03/billie-eilish- blocks-one-of-the-most-successful-musicians-of-all-time-from-a-new-no-1/ https://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/billie-eilish-hit-me-hard-and-soft/ https://www.pluggedin.com/album-reviews/billie-eilish-hit-me-hard-and-soft/ Category:Billie Eilish Category:2024 albums
title: Hit Me Hard and Soft
